title: For Sale/Trade:  Swedish mauser/Mosin Nagant hex ex dragoon/Hungarian M44
postcontent:
Parting out part of my collection. First, I have a 1925 Mosin 91/30 ex dragoon hex receiver in VGC, Izhevsk arsenal numbers matching rifle. TIght crown, good shooter. Second, I have a model 1896 carl gustav swedish mauser dated 1917. All numbers matching, has the square plate and disc on the stock (blank disc), and the threaded barrel with muzzle brake. Has a scope and mount on it, but can be put back to original for $50 worth of parts, or shoot it as is. Good bore, excellent shooter. Third rifle is a hungarian M44 in the usual condition as these were"mismatch" rifles built in hungary. Non matching serials, crack in upper handguard and rear tang. Good shooter, tight crown.These are hard to find and rare. Stocks are available and cheap, has the folding bayonet on it. WIll do a package deal for all three, or take partial trades of mil surp rifles, 9mm or .380 pistol and cash. No chinese or yugo SKS rifles, would consider a russian, romanian, or albanian SKS, a rasheed rifle, a hakim rifle, or other semi autos. Also looking for a nazi stamped P38 
Mosin with an ammo pouch, tool kit and sling $225
Swede mauser is $275 with 30+ rounds of ammo 6.5mm
Hungarian M44 $160
 I am just making room for some new semi autos to my collection, and I really do not shoot these anymore.

postcontent:
Up for sale is a completely refurbished and highly desirable Yugo SKS.... Anyone that knows anything about the SKS knows that the Yugo was one of the most reliable and desirable of the SKS platform.
This is the last one I am willing to part with so get it before it's gone.
If you are looking for a "cheap" SKS then this is not the rifle for you! I have spent ALOT of time and money on this.
Here is what has been done and/or added:
-All metals have been removed, cleaned and oiled. The original Yugo grenade sites are still in tack and fully functional
-New Tapco 6 position stock
-New bolt cover with tri-rail system
-New bolt cover pin
-New 6-24X50 illuminated sniper scope with dual mount posts
-New shell deflector to protect the scope from ejected rounds
-New barrel mount bi-pod
-New Cheek rest (really comfortable when looking down range through the scope)
-New contoured vertical grip
-Trigger assembly removed, cleaned and oiled
-Original Yugo Blued muzzle break
-NEW - Four 20 round mags
-I will also throw in 300+ rounds of ammo (some hollow point some full metal jacket)
Anyone that knows about the SKS platform already knows what i have invested in this rifle based on the list above.
I am NOT trying to make money here. Only trying to recover some of my investment which is MORE than my asking price.
I am asking $750.00 for it all..... Is there room for negotiating? Maybe but not much!

title: For Sale/Trade:  MK15 MGI HYDRA 5.56/7.62x39
postcontent:
I have to sell some toys to cover expenses...So up for sale is my New Mk15 Hydra by MGI industries. These unique AR15 clones have a proprietary switch barrel system that requires no tools. under the monolithic rail is a slide lock. release the lock slide it forward to expose 2 cam levers. Swing the cam levers out to 90 degrees and pull the barrel and gas tube free of the receiver. Change the bolt or simply have a new carrier/bolt set up ready, install and done. Can be achieved in seconds. 
The truly unique part of the MGI Hydra is the lower receiver. The problem with multi cal AR15s always revolves around the magazine well. 7.62x39 ar15 magazines are renowned for their unreliability, Pistol calibers for their finicky magazine blocks, and limitations of calibers by the size of the mag well. MGI fixed that in this design. The magazine well slide into and locks on machined rails in the receiver. Yes...the magazine well is removable. The magazine wells take the ammunition's native magazine. The 7.62x39 takes AK mags, 9mm takes glock mags with no block needed. Everything from .22lr to .50 beouwulf is already available. Conversion Kits can be ordered directly from MGI and come with magazine well barrel and bolt specific to the caliber and the mag well specific to magazine used. They are also the only ones offering a .308/762x51 conversion in an AR15 (not AR10 frame) by using their mag well and magazine.....why have to carry several rifles or have to keep several on hand. One AR can do it all. Saves space and carry loads.
Comes with over sized pistol case that holds upper lower and 2 barrels Plus ammo can with mags and ammo.
Im Selling the A Mk15 Hydra with the 223/5.56 Base with 6 position collapsible stock
comes with:
Modular Hydra lower with easy pull take down pins
Lower can be set up for any caliber .22 to .458 socom..even .308 in this lower.

223/5.56 barrel 
AR15 mag well
Removable Carry Handle Sight
Easy pull take down pins on 5.56 mag well and lower
Several Steel 30 rnd magazines and a few thermold 20 rnd magazines
380 rounds of mixed 223 ammo

Also included  an unfired 7.62x39 conversion:
7.62x39 barrel 
7.62x39 bolt
Magazine well that accepts Steel AK47 magazines
2 South Korean Steel AK mags
approx 400 rounds mixed 7.62x39 ammunition


Although ad says 5.56 it is both 5.56 and russian 7.62x39. can be converted from one to the other in a minute.

More pics available if desired.

title: For Sale:  AAC SPR M-4
postcontent:
The new patent pending M.I.T.E.R. System is the world’s first Adjustable-Zero fast-attach silencer mounting system. This revolutionary mounting system is designed to offer the operator the choice of instantly choosing between silenced or unsuppressed firing, while also providing the ability to adjust zero-shift. The M.I.T.E.R. System Blackout flash eliminator provides reliable precision accuracy and the ability of installation or removal of the silencer in seconds in the harshest military environment. The over-the-barrel design has minimal affect of the weapon’s center of balance and maneuverability. The extreme durability of the SPR/M4 & SCAR-H SD is maximized by CNC automated fusion welding of every high-temperature aerospace alloy component used in its construction- making 100% suppressed fire possible. The back-pressure lowering design of the silencer aids in shooter comfort, reduces weapon fouling, and minimizes cyclic rate increase. As a final step, tapered-bore EDM technology is utilized to ensure precise bore alignment resulting in enhanced accuracy and maximum performance. By removing approximately 97% of the muzzle report, the SPR/M4 eliminates the need for ear protection, preserves field communications, and masks the location of the shooter. Eliminating muzzle signature in combat saves lives.

Weight: 18 ozDiameter: 1.5″Length: 8.625″Length Added: 4.9″Sound Reduction: 33-36dB (From Manufacturer)Material: Inconel 718 & 316L SSFinish: Moly ResinSupplier: AAC

postcontent:
Kershaw Kai Japan Field Series Knives from the 1970 to 1980's.  

Model 1034 Field $90

It was the next to the largest in the top of the line hunting knife series made by Kershaw many years back. The series started about the time the company started in 1974.   blade is AUS-8A stainless steel and the black finger groove handle is phenolic (like a bowling ball) and brass. Cutting edge of blade measures 3 3/4", top of blade measures 5 1/4". Total length is 9 1/2". Blade marked..Kershaw Oregon USA by Kai Japan.  Very well done with a thick blade with thumb rest on the spine of the blade.  Knife comes with a leather and Kydex sheaths.

title: For Sale:  DSA RPD Semi-Auto Belt fed Machine Gun 7.62X39 Beltfed
postcontent: The RPD was the 1st belt-fed machine gun designed to fire in 7.62X39mm. The system was issued by the Soviet Army, China, North Korea and many others throughout the Eastern Bloc as well as Africa and S. America. The RPD was also used by U.S. SOF in Vietnam. These classic reproductions are true to form just as originally issued only in semiautomatic. They feature new U.S. made receivers, barrels and the proper 922R compliance components. One of the most battle tested and affordable belt-fed systems available. Each unit comes with its original field/deployment kit. This is a BATFE evaluated and approved semi-auto rifle.

location: Salt Lake City, Salt Lake City, Utah
postcontent: Winchester Model 1894 .30-30 W/Button Mag, Mfg. 1913. Stock # MSR062703. Serial # 666xxx. One of over a thousand Antique and Modern Collectible firearms, including Military, Sporting, Custom and Tactical guns, as well as Edged Weapons and Militaria we have for sale at Jackson Armory (see our other listings), this is also one of several lever-action Winchesters we have in stock at this time. This is a nice vintage 1894 Winchester Rifle, made in 1913, and chambered for .30-30. The rifle has a 26” round barrel, a special-order button mag, and a crescent butt plate. title: For Trade:  300 ACC Blackout Brass
postcontent:
300 ACC Blackout Brass for Sale  
Salem ILL
LC07 headstamp

1.	223 brass was uniformly cut off with a  mini chop saw and jig.
2.	It has been ran through a full length sizing die TWICE. The die was set using a Wilson Case Gauge and a Sheridan Gauge. SAMMI specs.
3.	Brass was cleaned inside and out with a sonic cleaner. ( some of the brass does still have minor stains on the inside, outside looks new.) From this point on, latex gloves were worn every time the brass was handled.
4.	Brass is tumbled to a brilliant shine.
5.	Primer pockets are swaged and squared up.
6.	Brass is trimmed to 1.358 inches + or – 0.002
7.	Brass is then properly annealed on a Ken Light annealer.

There is quite a bit of 300 blackout brass being made, but check out how it is being made….

1.	Has it been properly full length sized to SAMMI specs, by full length resizing it TWICE, the necks are more uniform and the shoulders are squared up more rather than being rounded off. 
2.	I see a lot of military brass being sold where the primer pockets have not been cleaned, swaged and squared up. 
3.	Most of the brass out there has not been annealed. Annealing will add to the life of the brass and also help with proper neck tension when seating the bullet.

 NOTE: This brass has been sized to SAMMI 300 ACC Blackout specs, it may not be properly headspaced for single shot , break open guns such as T C Contenders or Encores. I have an older T C Encore in 300 Whisper, it is not correctly headspaced for this brass. It is your responsibility to check the headspacing on your gun.

I currently have 6000 + pieces ready to go.

Pricing is as follows and does not include shipping
 100 pieces…$26.00
 500 pieces…$125.00
1000 + pieces…$240
Cash or Postal Money Orders is the only type of payment I will accept.

Shipping
100 – 200…..$6.00
300 – 3000…$13.00
3000+ …$16.00 

I will meet with you in Salem or Iuka for no charge to help save on shipping.

title: For Sale/Trade:  REDUCED PRICE:  CZ 453 (not 452) Varmint rifle / scope package, in .17 HMR
postcontent:
This is a CZ 453 Varmint, in .17 HMR.  This is most likely the highest-quality, most accurate rifle ever built by CZ in the 452 / 453 / 455 lineup, and won't be made ever again, since they switched the 455 system.

This 45-three (not 452) means that it has the single-set trigger, which was the less-common version in these.  This Varmint model has the 20.5" heavy/bull barrel with the beautiful walnut stock with widened forearm and nice tiger striping.  Comes with one 5-round mag.

This rifle was purchased new by me and has a very low round count, under 80 rounds.  It is excellent or maybe excellent+ condition; I'd say about 91% - 94%, but not exactly sure (I'll let you decide; ask if you want more pics).  I also have the box and papers but will need to find them.

This rifle is a proven sub-.700 MOA performer with genuine 5-shot groups at 50 yards averaging around .340 CTC.  Deadly laser to 125+ yards on any small game.

Comes with or without (your choice) mounted Swift Premier 3-9x50mm. Excellent condition with box, papers, sunshade, lens covers. Very light mounting marks. This big objective lens gathers a lot of light for dusk and dawn hunting. This scope is around $236 plus shipping new - see for example: http://swfa.com/Swift-3-9x50-Premier-Rifle-Scope-P7280.aspx
The rings are all-steel, very high quality CZ-brand rings.

Old Price:  $650 with scope / $570 without

New Price:  Yours for $610 for everything, or $540 for rifle without scope, BUT WITH the steel rings.  I believe this is an excellent price for this discontinued, sought-after, uncommon configuration, between the Varmint profile, set trigger (453), and chambering of .17 HMR.  So no need to offer less unless it's boot money with a trade offer, please.

Those are FTF prices.  Add $30 for shipping to your door if you are Okla. resident via FedEx ground, or to your FFL's door anywhere in CONUS if not an Okla. resident.  Please note that if I send to you directly rather than to FFL, as allowed per BATFE regs, I need to see some proof of residency (text me pic of driver's license), and I do my own OSCN background check for felony convictions.

I will also sell the Swift Premier scope separately for $90 shipped to your door.

I also have the following ammo for sale, which you can buy or not if you get the rifle:  
1.  75 rounds (1.5 boxes) of CCI TNT Explosive 17 gr. JHP
2.  72 rounds (1.5 boxes) of Federal Premium V-Shok 17 gr with Speer TNT HP
3.  175 rounds (3.5 boxes) of Hornady 17 gr V-Max

For a total of 322 rounds.  I will ship them in the same box (so no added shipping beyond the $30 shown in the ad), for an additional $75 even.

postcontent:
Listed is a Robinson Arms 7.62x39 XCR-L with a 16 inch barrel and lots of extras. 

The rifle's furniture consists of a Magpul UBR stock with padded cheek rest on Robinson Arms' side folding end plate adapter. Hogue rubber pistol grip and a Magpul Angled Fore Grip. 

It's coming with HK416 backup iron sights, BSA Edge variable power long eye relief scope with a BSA micro red dot offset to gunner's right. 

Threaded muzzle device is a Precision Reflex MSTN QC 30 caliber muzzle brake. 

Included with the kit is an Ares Armor Huskey Mark II EWS padded sling in ATACS-FG with the two-to-one tri-glide device and quick release swivels on both ends. Also included is 5 C-products magazines with original magpuls on each. 

Rifle is in excellent condition stored in a case with low miles. I may have only put 300 rounds through this rifle total. I love my PTR32 to much, especially after I finally got it to cycle reliably so I hardly ever take the XCR out. 

I'm asking $1000 for the entire kit and that price is firm.

Due to Colorado laws I'm going to require an FFL transfer for the sale of this rifle.

postcontent:
The Vanguard action incorporates a one piece fluted bolt with three gas ports and two locking lugs for a 90-degree bolt lift. The bolt shroud is fully enclosed for extra strength and structural integrity, and features a traditional side release of the bolt assembly. Embellishments such as a knurled bolt knob add to the beauty and value of this popular rifle. The next generation of Weatherby rifles featuring a match quality two-stage trigger, new stock design and guaranteed SUB-MOA accuracy. New look. New feel. A new level of performance. Proven Weatherby Vanguard action (Mauser-style, dual opposed lug design) SUB-MOA Accuracy Guarantee ensures .99" or less 3-shot group at 100 yards when used with Weatherby factory or premium ammunition. Match Quality Two-Stage Trigger is "creep free" for consistent let-off and is adjustable down to 2.5 lbs. Trigger housing is constructed of lightweight alloy. Full Length 24" Barrel provides maximum velocity and increased accuracy. All barrels are cold hammer forged for long life. Stock with Exclusive Griptonite Inserts provides lightweight and durable performance year after year. Combines modern synthetic materials with the legendary Weatherby raised comb Monte Carlo design. Special Griptonite pistol grip and forend inserts provide a firm, non-slip grip. Also features a right side palm swell to aid in control and shooter comfort.
